caption.p: Total contents of volatile terpenoids (mg/g fresh weight (FW)) in young and mature tissues and different tissue sources from Rosmarinus officinalis L. Data are means of 9 replicates + SE (standard error). Different letters indicate significant differences (by the Mann–Whitney U-test, p < 0.05). L, leaf; B, cortex; X, xylem tissue; Y, young tissue; M, mature tissue. Samples collected from the upper part (u) and at the base (b) of the branch are indicated respectively, as “u” and “b”.
